list.name: Indice group id
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
    UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
    <text_column> as text,
    <tags_column> as tags
  FROM <table name>
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
  ORDER BY <time_column> ASC
  LIMIT 100

panels.content: ENERGIA
INCIDENTES

panels.description: status de troca da batéria - Nobreak
panels.title: status de troca da batéria - Nobreak

panels.content: CONTROLE DE ACESSO

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
count(distinct hosts.name) as "Up"
from history_uint 
    inner join items on
    items.itemid = history_uint.itemid
    inner join hosts on
    items.hostid = hosts.hostid
    inner join hosts_groups on
    hosts.hostid = hosts_groups.hostid
where 
  hosts_groups.groupid = $groupid and
  hosts.name in($controllers) and
  history_uint.clock between (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 700) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP() and
  history_uint.value = 1

SELECT 
count(distinct hosts.name) as "Down"
from history_uint 
    inner join items on
    items.itemid = history_uint.itemid
    inner join hosts on
    items.hostid = hosts.hostid
    inner join hosts_groups on
    hosts.hostid = hosts_groups.hostid
where 
  hosts_groups.groupid = $groupid and
  hosts.name in($controllers) and
  history_uint.clock between (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 700) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP() and
  history_uint.value = 0

panels.content: VIDEO MONITORAMENTO

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
(((SELECT 
    avg(history_uint.value)
    from history_uint 
         inner join items on
         items.itemid = history_uint.itemid
         inner join hosts on
         items.hostid = hosts.hostid
         inner join hosts_groups on
        hosts.hostid = hosts_groups.hostid
    where 
      hosts_groups.groupid = $groupid and
      hosts.name in("$exacqvision") and
      history_uint.clock between (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 700) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP() and 
      items.name in("/mnt/edvr/0: Used space") limit 1
     ) / 

(SELECT 
    avg(history_uint.value)
    from history_uint 
         inner join items on
         items.itemid = history_uint.itemid
         inner join hosts on
         items.hostid = hosts.hostid
         inner join hosts_groups on
        hosts.hostid = hosts_groups.hostid
    where 
      hosts_groups.groupid = $groupid and
      hosts.name in("$exacqvision") and
      history_uint.clock between (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 700) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP() and 
      items.name in("/mnt/edvr/0: Total space") limit 1
     )) * 100) as "Percentual de consumo"

SELECT 
count(distinct hosts.name) as "Up"
from history_uint 
    inner join items on
    items.itemid = history_uint.itemid
    inner join hosts on
    items.hostid = hosts.hostid
    inner join hosts_groups on
    hosts.hostid = hosts_groups.hostid
where 
  hosts_groups.groupid = $groupid and
  hosts.name in($cftv) and
  history_uint.clock between (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 700) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP() and
  history_uint.value = 1

SELECT 
count(distinct hosts.name) as "Down"
from history_uint 
    inner join items on
    items.itemid = history_uint.itemid
    inner join hosts on
    items.hostid = hosts.hostid
    inner join hosts_groups on
    hosts.hostid = hosts_groups.hostid
where 
  hosts_groups.groupid = $groupid and
  hosts.name in($cftv) and
  history_uint.clock between (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 700) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP() and
  history_uint.value = 0

panels.content: TELEFONIA

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
count(distinct hosts.name) as "Up"
from history_uint 
    inner join items on
    items.itemid = history_uint.itemid
    inner join hosts on
    items.hostid = hosts.hostid
    inner join hosts_groups on
    hosts.hostid = hosts_groups.hostid
where 
  hosts_groups.groupid = $groupid and
  hosts.name in($interfones) and
  history_uint.clock between (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 700) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP() and
  history_uint.value = 1

SELECT 
count(distinct hosts.name) as "Down"
from history_uint 
    inner join items on
    items.itemid = history_uint.itemid
    inner join hosts on
    items.hostid = hosts.hostid
    inner join hosts_groups on
    hosts.hostid = hosts_groups.hostid
where 
  hosts_groups.groupid = $groupid and
  hosts.name in($interfones) and
  history_uint.clock between (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 700) and UNIX_TIMESTAMP() and
  history_uint.value = 0
